subScenes.name: 初次问候
subScenes.description: 签证官开场问候并核对信息

qaPairs.speakerText: Good morning. Can I see your passport and I-20?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 早上好，请出示你的护照和I-20表。

responses.text: Sure, here you go.
Of course, I've got them ready.
Here they are.

qaPairs.usageNote: 礼貌快速递出材料，别慌张

subScenes.name: 学习计划
subScenes.description: 回答为何选择该专业和学校

qaPairs.speakerText: Why did you choose this program at UCLA?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你为什么选择加州大学洛杉矶分校的这个项目？

responses.text: I'm majoring in environmental science because my undergrad thesis focused on urban air quality, and UCLA's research in sustainable cities aligns perfectly with my goals.
responses.text_cn: 我主修环境科学，因为我的本科论文研究城市空气质量，而UCLA在可持续城市方面的研究与我的目标完全契合。

responses.text: It's a top program for this field, and I wanna work in green tech back home.
responses.text_cn: 这是这个领域的顶尖项目，我想回国做绿色科技。

responses.text: Because my advisor recommended it.

qaPairs.usageNote: 结合个人经历，避免空话

qaPairs.speakerText: What do you plan to do after graduation?

responses.text: I'll return to China and join my family's environmental consulting firm to help implement US-style sustainability standards.
responses.text_cn: 我会回中国，加入家族环保咨询公司，推广美国的可持续标准。

responses.text: Go back home — my job's waiting for me.
I might stay for a bit to gain experience.

qaPairs.usageNote: 强调明确回国计划，避免模糊

subScenes.name: 资金证明
subScenes.description: 说明学费和生活费来源

qaPairs.speakerText: How are you funding your studies?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你的学费和生活费怎么解决？

responses.text: My parents are covering it — they've got a savings account with enough for all four years, and I've got the bank statements to prove it.
responses.text_cn: 我父母承担，他们账户里有足够四年的钱，我带了银行流水。

responses.text: Scholarship + family support — I've got the award letter right here.
responses.text_cn: 奖学金加家里支持，奖状我带着呢。

responses.text: I got a loan.

qaPairs.usageNote: 具体说明来源，带凭证更可信

qaPairs.speakerText: Aren't you worried you might not come back?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你不怕毕业后不回国吗？

responses.text: No, I've got strong ties at home — my parents live there, my job offer's confirmed, and I'm the only child responsible for our family business.
responses.text_cn: 不会，我家里有父母、已确认的工作，还是独生子，要接手家族生意。

responses.text: I'm going back — my whole life's there.
responses.text_cn: 我肯定回，我所有生活都在那儿。

responses.text: I just wanna learn, then go home.
responses.text_cn: 就想学点东西，然后回家。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用家庭、工作、责任证明回国决心

subScenes.name: 结束道别
subScenes.description: 签证结果告知与礼貌告别

qaPairs.speakerText: Your visa is approved. Here's your passport. Welcome to the US!
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你的签证通过了，这是你的护照，欢迎来美国！

responses.text: Thank you so much! I really appreciate it.
responses.text_cn: 太感谢了！真的非常感激。

responses.text: Awesome! Thanks a lot.
Thanks.

qaPairs.usageNote: 简短真诚感谢，保持礼貌

qaPairs.speakerText: Don't forget to check your email for SEVIS registration instructions.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 别忘了查邮箱，会有SEVIS注册说明。

responses.text: Got it — I'll check right away.
Will do, thanks for reminding me.
Okay.

qaPairs.usageNote: 回应要体现你听懂并会执行
